member.name: T:JetBrains.Common.UI.WPF.BindableRun
member.summary: A subclass of the Run element that exposes a DependencyProperty property to allow data binding.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Common.UI.WPF.Commands.CommandSinkBinding
member.summary: A CommandBinding subclass that will attach its CanExecute and Executed events to the event handling methods on the object referenced by its CommandSink property. Set the attached CommandSink property on the element whose CommandBindings collection contain CommandSinkBindings. If you dynamically create an instance of this class and add it to the CommandBindings of an element, you must explicitly set its CommandSink property.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Common.UI.WPF.Commands.CommandSinkBinding.CommonElement
member.summary: This class makes it easier to write code that works with the common members of both the FrameworkElement and FrameworkContentElement classes.

member.summary: Tracks changes of binding values for collection of objects. Consists of two collections: collection of source object and collection of property bindings to evaluate. Items are registered by / methods. PRoperties are registered by / methods.

member.summary: Removes all items and bindings

member.name: M:JetBrains.Common.UI.WPF.Controls.IItemBindingsTracker.GetValue``1(System.Object,System.Windows.DependencyProperty)
member.summary: Evaluates current value of item's property
member.param: Source item. If that item is not registered, value must be evaluated anyway
Registered dependency property which value is to be evaluated
member.returns: Value of the property of the source item. If binding for that property is not registered, returns default value.

member.summary: Sets transparent binding at the property of the target object with a registered source item
member.param: Dependency Object for which to set binding
Dependency Property of the target object. Not necessary to be registered
member.returns: True if source item had been registered or false otherwise.

member.name: E:JetBrains.Common.UI.WPF.Controls.IItemBindingsTracker.ItemPropertyChanged
member.summary: Fires when a value of property for some of the registered items changes. Does not fire when item or dependency property is just registered.
